answers.text: The National Association for Research & Therapy of Homosexuality

qas.question: What does NARTH consider itself to be?

answers.text: a "professional, scientific organization that offers hope to those who struggle with unwanted homosexuality,
the mainstream mental health community's position on conversion therapy

qas.question: What does NARTH state is wrong with the mainstream mental healths stand on conversion therapy?

answers.text: its effectiveness and by describing sexual orientation not as a binary immutable quality

qas.question: What concerns did both the American Psychological Association and the Royal College of PSychiatrist have with NARTH?

answers.text: that the positions espoused by NARTH are not supported by the science and create an environment in which prejudice and discrimination can flourish

context: <a0_0>The National Association for Research & Therapy of Homosexuality<a0_0/> (NARTH), which describes itself as <a1_0>a "professional, scientific organization that offers hope to those who struggle with unwanted homosexuality,<a1_0/>" disagrees with <a2_0>the mainstream mental health community's position on conversion therapy<a2_0/>, both on <a3_0>its effectiveness and by describing sexual orientation not as a binary immutable quality<a3_0/>, or as a disease, but as a continuum of intensities of sexual attractions and emotional affect. The American Psychological Association and the Royal College of Psychiatrists expressed concerns <a4_0>that the positions espoused by NARTH are not supported by the science and create an environment in which prejudice and discrimination can flourish<a4_0/>.
